contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''RCT''' may stand for: * ''Random conical tilt'', a technique used in [[Cryo-electron microscopy]] * [[Randomized controlled trial]], or randomized clinical trial * [[Rational Choice Theory]] - a framework for understanding social and economic behavior * [[Regents (Examinations)#Regents Competency Test (RCT)|Regents Competency Test]], an alternative standardized test for special education high school students in New York State * [[Regimental combat team]] * [[Rehabilitation and Research Centre for Torture Victims]] * [[Relational-cultural therapy]] * ''Reverse cholesterol transport'', pathway by which peripheral cell cholesterol can be returned to the liver for recycling to extrahepatic tissues, hepatic storage, or excretion into the intestine in bile. * [[Reverse conducting thyristor]] * [[Rhondda Cynon Taf]], a county borough in Wales, UK * ''Ring compression test'', is an accurate technique to determine the true stress-true strain curve in typical metal-forming operations, and its accuracy was shown at high temperatures and low strain rates. * [[Ritchey-ChrÃ©tien telescope]] * [[RollerCoaster Tycoon (series)|''RollerCoaster Tycoon'' (series)]], a video game series ** ''[[RollerCoaster Tycoon]]'', the first game in the series * [[endodontic therapy|Root canal therapy]], dental treatment to treat nerve damage of the tooth * [[Rose City Transit]], a former mass transit company in Portland, Oregon * [[Royal Corps of Transport]] * [[RC Toulonnais|Rugby Club Toulonnais]], a rugby union club from Toulon, France * [[Rural Community Transportation]], a public bus system in Vermont {{disambig}}
